title: How can I preven otheres from being ab.e to get ny payment information ( credit card information).
content: What can I do about preventing people from being able to get excess to my credit card information with out my permission & there by using it illegally Yet be able to keep my card information in the Google crom to be able to keep my Google account active to pay my Google subscription fees & phone bill's threw my Verizon  phone app please let me know keeping in mind that my Google app & my Viruse app may be outdated but unfortunetly I don't have enough memory to be able to get the updates download unfortunetly untill the Calculations epidemic is over & I can get my table's information transferred to my NEW tablet that WILL HAVE more memory & there by give me space for being able to download the required updates for this & other apps that I have on my tablet requireing updates currently.
